name: Kendra: Heavily Pregnant Defender of Earth
name_original: Kendra: Heavily Pregnant Defender of Earth
description:
I learned to computer program when I was pregnant with my son. This game was one of my early efforts from back then. I reworked it for the REVIVAL track of 8 Bits to Infinity's (Re)vision Jam 2020. The original version is included here to show progress as per the rules of the jam but I strongly recommend playing the updated version.

Changes from the initial version to the present one:

- Made it fit on any screen size 

- Overhauled UI including switching to an ever-visible inventory system

- Improved combat by making heroine glow when in punching range

- Changed from music of unknown provenance to Joshua McLean music

- Added written dialog because the spoken dialog is sometimes hard to hear

- Fixed many bugs
